mapper.insert: MERGE INTO ALARM USING DUAL ON (USER_NO = #{userNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET AUTHORITY_UPDATE = 2 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( ALARM_CODE , USER_NO , AUTHORITY_UPDATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT 'ALARM_'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ALARM_CODE, 7))), 0) + 1, 3, '0') ALARM_CODE FROM ALARM) , #{userNo} , #{authorityUpdate} )
mapper.select: SELECT REALTOR_CODE , TO_USER_NO , INQUIRY_CODE , INQUIRY_ANSWER FROM INQUIRY I , REALTOR_DETAIL R WHERE TO_USER_NO = #{toUserNo} AND I.TO_USER_NO = R.USER_NO
